original_text: ‘Son of man, King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon attacked the city of Tyre with his army. His soldiers had to work very hard. They carried heavy loads so that it hurt their heads and their shoulders. They had a lot of pain. But they did not get anything valuable from Tyre, even though they worked so hard.
korean_text: 인자야 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕이 그의 군대로 두로를 치게 할 때에 크게 수고하여 모든 머리털이 무지러졌고 모든 어깨가 벗어졌으나 그와 군대가 그 수고한 대가를 두로에서 얻지 못하였느니라

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon attacked the city of Tyre
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 왕 느부갓네살이 두로 성을 공격했다

sentences.original_text: His soldiers had to work very hard
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 군사들은 매우 힘들게 일해야 했다

sentences.original_text: so that it hurt their heads and their shoulders
They had a lot of pain
But they did not get anything valuable from Tyre
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 두로에서 아무 귀한 것도 얻지 못했다
